text.div:
Leptospirosis (Tests for Leptospira by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    20869-4 Leptospira sp [Presence] in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    23599-4 Leptospira sp identified in Tissue by Organism specific culture
    594-2 Leptospira sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    6453-5 Leptospira sp identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
    6454-3 Leptospira sp identified in Cerebral spinal fluid by Organism specific culture
    6455-0 Leptospira sp identified in Urine by Organism specific culture
    71378-4 Leptospira sp [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    86732-5 Leptospira sp identified [Type] in Isolate by Sequencing
